content.rendered:
About Us

Discover integrated logistics solutions at TrueLog. We offer expert services in Singapore and beyond, enhancing your supply chain experience. Explore our comprehensive offerings today.

  1. Home

Cut Costs Smartly

We combine multiple small shipments, sharing transportation costs and delivering major savings.

Boost Efficiency

Streamline your import and export operations with freight forwarders, saving time and reducing costs of logistics seamlessly.

Speed Clearance

Enjoy faster customs clearance and deferred duty payments, ensuring your goods aren't delayed.

At TrueLog

Integrated Logistics Solutions | Top Courier Company Singapore

At TrueLog Pte Ltd, we go beyond mere logistics; we craft seamless, end-to-end solutions tailored specifically for the Information and Communications Technology (ICT) sector. Our expertise spans the essential spectrum of logistics services, including sophisticated freight forwarding, comprehensive Importer of Record (IOR) & Exporter of Record (EOR) services, meticulous compliance consulting, and dedicated global fulfilment services.

We understand the unique challenges and demands of the ICT industry. Hence, our approach is not just about moving goods but about creating value and facilitating growth for our clients. With TrueLog Pte Ltd, you gain a partner committed to delivering excellence, efficiency, and expertise in every facet of ICT logistics. Join us in navigating the complexities of global logistics, and let us empower your business to achieve its fullest potential.

Get a Quote
Years of Experience
0 +

Our Company In Number

Offices & Logistic Facilities
0
Countries Worldwide
0 +
Professional Workers
0 +

Meet The Team

Our Team

Truelog’s strength comes from our employees. We have a well-experienced team of people providing you with customised solutions at a competitive cost whilst ensuring a qualitative service.

Meet All Team

Ibn Talal

Founder & Commercial Director

Ibn Talal

Founder & Operations Director

Why Choose Us

Experience the benefits of TrueLog Advantage

We redefines excellence in global logistics with unmatched efficiency and precision. Our comprehensive solutions are designed to streamline your operations and provide seamless support for your business.

First-Time Customs Clearance

Seamless clearance with IOR and EOR solutions.

Direct Delivery

IT infrastructure delivered to your chosen data center.

Single Point of Contact

Project management from a single shipment to a global rollout.

Global Trade Compliance

Access to compliance advisory services and a vast compliance database.

Accreditations & Certifications

“Our mission is to be a flexible, competitive and trustworthy logistics provider, offering added value in a swift manner to our clients.
We take great pride in providing you with the best solution. Your word of mouth is what makes us grow and excel.”
